@description.name: @description
@description.body: Interface implemented by all Qookery components

@description.name: @description
@description.body: {String} Symbolic name of component, unique within its containing form

@description.name: @description
@description.body: {Map} Mapping of prefixes to namespace URIs to associate with component, set by parser after instantiation

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the component is enabled

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the component is visible

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Return the component identifier, if any

This identifier is guaranteed to be unique within the defining XML document

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the type of an attribute

@param.name: @param
@param.body: attributeName {String} name of the attribute
@param.description: name of the attribute

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Set an attribute's value

NB: Few attributes are expected by implementations to be modified this way - be sure to check component documentation for supported changes.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: attributeName {String} the name of the attribute to change
@param.description: the name of the attribute to change

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {any} the new attribute value, undefined clears attribute
@param.description: the new attribute value, undefined clears attribute

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resolve a URI namespace prefix

@param.name: @param
@param.body: prefix {String} the prefix to resolve
@param.description: the prefix to resolve

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String?} namespace URI or null if prefix is unknown
@return.description: namespace URI or null if prefix is unknown

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Resolve a QName

The result format is "{" + Namespace URI + "}" + local part. If the namespace URI is empty, only the local part is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: qName {String} the QName to resolve
@param.description: the QName to resolve

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} the string representation of the resolved QName
@return.description: the string representation of the resolved QName

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Called by the form parser soon after initialization and attribute parsing

Notice: You must never call this method directly.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: attributes {Map} preprocessed attributes found in the defining XML document
@param.description: preprocessed attributes found in the defining XML document

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Called by the parser when an unknown XML element is encountered within a component's declaration

Notice: You must never call this method directly.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: elementName {String} the resolved fully-qualified name of encountered DOM element
@param.description: the resolved fully-qualified name of encountered DOM element

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} the DOM element that is not understood by parser
@param.description: the DOM element that is not understood by parser

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true in case the component was able to do something with input
@return.description: true in case the component was able to do something with input

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Called by the parser after creation of the component and all its children

Notice: You must never call this method directly.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the form containing this component

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the parent component or null if this is the root component

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Evaluate a Qookery expression within component's scripting context

@param.name: @param
@param.body: expression {String} a valid JavaScript expression
@param.description: a valid JavaScript expression

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Execute Qookery scripting code on component

@param.name: @param
@param.body: clientCode {String} a valid Qookery script
@param.description: a valid Qookery script

@param.name: @param
@param.body: argumentMap {Map?} a map to be passed as arguments to the script
@param.description: a map to be passed as arguments to the script

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the focus to this component

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return a list of widgets that are handled by this component

@param.name: @param
@param.body: filterName {String} if set, one of 'topMost', 'main' to restrict resulting list
@param.description: if set, one of 'topMost', 'main' to restrict resulting list

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.core.Widget[]} widget list - an empty array if none found
@return.description: widget list - an empty array if none found

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Return the main widget

This method a shorthand for #listWidgets('main')[0]

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add an event handler to this component

@param.name: @param
@param.body: eventName {String} the name of the event to listen to
@param.description: the name of the event to listen to

@param.name: @param
@param.body: handler {Function} a function to execute when the event is triggered
@param.description: a function to execute when the event is triggered

@param.name: @param
@param.body: onlyOnce {Boolean} if true, the listener will be removed as soon as it triggered for the first time
@param.description: if true, the listener will be removed as soon as it triggered for the first time

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Check whether the action exist or not.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: actionName {String} the name of the action
@param.description: the name of the action

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Execute an action provided by this component

It is safe to call this method for undefined actions, in which case null is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: actionName {String} one the actions provided by component
@param.description: one the actions provided by component

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {any} any number of arguments that will be passed to action's function
@param.description: any number of arguments that will be passed to action's function

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Request validation of component state and contents

NB: Components should not return errors when disabled, hidden or excluded.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qookery.util.ValidationError} discovered validation error or null if component is valid
@return.description: discovered validation error or null if component is valid

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return a translated message

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} the identifier of the wanted message
@param.description: the identifier of the wanted message

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add a disposable to the list of objects that will be disposed automatically together with component

@param.name: @param
@param.body: disposable {Object} any object that has a dispose property that is a function
@param.description: any object that has a dispose property that is a function

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Return an attribute's value if defined, or a default value if missing

You may supply the Error JS build-in object as the default value parameter in order to request that a range error is thrown when attribute is missing.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} the name of the wanted attribute
@param.description: the name of the wanted attribute

@param.name: @param
@param.body: defaultValue {any} optional default value, undefined will be used if not provided
@param.description: optional default value, undefined will be used if not provided

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {any} attribute's value or requested default value if attribute is not defined within the set
@return.description: attribute's value or requested default value if attribute is not defined within the set

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {RangeError} in case attribute is not part of the set and the default value was set to Error
@throws.description: in case attribute is not part of the set and the default value was set to Error

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property enabled. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #enabled}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property enabled. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #enabled}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property enabled. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #enabled}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property enabled. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #enabled}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property visibility. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #visibility}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property visibility. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #visibility}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property visibility. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #visibility}.
